name: Right To Repair
description:
Right to repair is a top-down, 3D free for all, where you play as robots battling over control of a repair bay. The goal is to stand in the bay and repair your robot, while trying to keep other players out. The first to fully repair their robot is the winner.

Two to Four players.  Supports controllers plus Keyboard.

Controller - Left Stick move, A-Punch, B-Block,  X-Dash.

Keyboard - WASD or Arrow Keys Move, < or X punch,  > or Z block, Space Dash.
